table.stmt: SELECT distinct [CounterCode] ,pd.[Unitcode] ,sum([Amount]) as amount FROM [BI_LS_New].[dbo].[BI_Transactionlog_NS] tn inner join [ERP_WITPOS].[dbo].[I_ERP_Products] pd on pd.Unitcode = tn.Unitcode where TXD_Date >= ? and TXD_Date <= ? and [Brand] = N'ZW' and [K3ProductCode] not like N'C%' and [Status] = N'B' and CounterCode not like N'00000%' group by [CounterCode],pd.[Unitcode] order by [CounterCode],amount desc
